summary: A standalone follower made with the best Megan preset on the Nexus.
descriptionHtml:
[center][/center][center]Yet another Megan Fox follower. Only this time, Jonay's Awesome preset was used in her creation.
She is a one hand warrior tank.
Megan can be found in the drunken huntsmen.
There are two versions. UUNP special and COS CBBE HDT bodies. HDT physics extension and XPMSE are required for HDT functions to work.
The UNP version has Leyenda skin textures and the CBBE version has fair skin complexion. Files are loose so you can drag and drop whatever you want.
She does not come with any gear at all. This way she should not refuse anything you give her. Be sure and get her some gear right away.

Q: Aren't there enough Megan Fox mods already?
A: Yes and they are all very nice but none of them look as good as Jonay's preset so here it is.

Q: Can you make it with the long hair in Jonay's screenshots?
A: Yes, if I could find that hair.

Q; (more of a statement) This is not lore friendly!
A: It is if you imagine skyrim as a movie co staring Megan Fox!

Q: Why different textures for the different bodies?
A: I am currently running UNP in my game with Leyenda skin. I don't have leyenda for CBBE at the moment and don't feel like downloading it and sorting through all of the options it has while I have fair skin complexion in a folder at the ready.

Q: can you make XX celebrity?
A: I will if someone else makes a really good preset that I can use. I suck at making them myself.

Mods used to make this mod
Megan Fox Preset
UUNP
CBBE
Bodyslide
SG hair pack 268
Leyenda skin
fair skin complexion
The eyes of beauty
SG brows
Make a follower kit[/center]
author: BaldMike021
